groovyx.gpars.dataflow.impl

Class DataflowChannelEventOrchestrator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • groovyx.gpars.dataflow.impl.DataflowChannelEventOrchestrator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindErrorDistributor<T>, BindErrorListenerManager<T>, DataflowChannelEventDistributor<T>, DataflowChannelEventListenerManager<T>

    public final class DataflowChannelEventOrchestrator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataflowChannelEventListenerManager<T>, BindErrorListenerManager<T>, DataflowChannelEventDistributor<T>, BindErrorDistributor<T>
    Groups the listener-related functionality shared by dataflow channels
    Author:
    Vaclav Pech
